reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can see
reviews.reviewText: This thing packs a good punch for quality and price. Easy mounting. Lost a screw but fabbed one up. Captures everything around the work truck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy this
reviews.reviewText: The camera is way too small. You can barely see the camera. You can barely see anything it’s very dim it doesn’t look bright. It doesn’t look clear at all. It looks old-fashioned. It came scratched on the screen on the lens of the camera. Everything was connected properly the back camera somehow it’s not working. It’s only showing two pictures. Do not buy this. It does not look what it seems like I need my money back. I will be returning this And I don’t write bad reviews only if it’s something really wrong and everything is wrong with this just bad item. They are advertising this and you need to take this down and send a better product. Don’t send products that are not true. You’re putting false advertisement up here and it’s not right and I do want my money back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this when it had a discount for around 59.99 and it works as it's supposed to so far. It isn't anything complicated or fancy so setting it up wasn't hard. The microphone is something i didnt fond myself needing, I dont really care if the dash cam video has sound. I have to suggest making the instruction manual a little bigger but other than that it's alright.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good, inexpensive dash cam. Very easy to set up and get started for basic needs.I have a backup camera but I wanted a full time rear camera also in case of accident. The cord for the rear camera is NOT long enough to fully pass through (hidden) in our built out Ford Transit so for now the cord is just dangling. Ordered an extension to see if that works.But overall, easy to use once you play with it a bit. Like others said, directions are fine but hard to understand until you actually start messing with the camera functions. And you will need glasses...the font is tiny.I assume to get all 3 views on the screen at once, you have to tie the extra red cord into your existing electrical, which I am not doing. But I don't get all 3 camera views simultaneously on mine...only 2 at a time.The mount is not suction based, but rather a 3m tape so really not designed to move to different vehicles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I first plugged it in my car, the engine light came on. I would unplug it and take it to dealer, it would be fixed. When I would plug it back in, the engine light came back on.. This happened three times. I am assuming it is the dash cam that caused the engine light to come on...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone should own one
reviews.reviewText: This device is great for showing what really happened in case of an accident.I had a guy run into the back of me leaving a supermarket, as he was rushing to get out of the parking lot and not looking ahead at me stopped, but at approaching traffic.Guy was obviously drinking as he reeked of alcohol and slurred speech. He was cursing me out because I stopped (due to traffic moving too quickly for me to pull out).He was mad because I had a big Navigator with a trailer hitch and he ran into it. Zero damage to me, but it messed up his bumper.He kept getting in my face. I offered to call the cops and let them review my dashcam video, and suggested that with him being inebriated, it's just best he drive away, which he did.He knew he was at fault, and my video was evidence he couldn't fight. I had no damage, so it wasn't worth me pushing the issue.These things will help you when you need. And even if it's not you in an accident, maybe you can help someone else with your recording.I bought this for a grandson, and with the interior cab recording, he knows he needs his passengers to behave when they are driving somewhere, as this can be reviewed by his parents too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dash cam for great price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought the dash cam recently and can say, this is of a good quality! and comes for a great price. Total value for money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Buy This Camera
reviews.reviewText: Terrible quality through and through. Claims to be a 4k camera and yet I've owned rocks that could give a better image quality. Straight out of the box this thing feels like a cheap hunk of junk. Not to mention the seller changed the item, so all the 5 star reviews on this page aren't even related to this dash cam. (Just read the reviews for yourself).The navigation is confusing, it is not user friendly at all. The image range is also nowhere near the advertised range. The camera facing inside the car to record passengers can barely even span across one seat in my car.Also, who puts the charging port ON THE TOP of the device, so that you have to bend the cable downwards in front of the camera lense in order to plug it in to charge?I just received this item today, and will be returning it today. I wouldn't even pay $5 for this dash cam.
